title: Guggenheim Securities Hires Orcun Unlu Away From Citigroup
sub_head: The executive will be in charge of establishing a private-funds advisory business
body:
Guggenheim Securities, the investment banking and capital markets division of Guggenheim Partners, has tapped the global head of Citigroup Inc.â€™s private funds group to launch a new advisory service.
Chicago-based Guggenheim has hired Orcun Unlu to build out the secondary advisory capabilities of its securities arm in New York as a senior managing director and head of private capital advisory, according to a person familiar with the matter.
